data.title: Diana Hoddinott (Towb) at the cutting edge (1962)
data.meta_description: Diana says: "That photo was from a play called The Patch Card directed by James MacTaggart - he of the now annual MacTaggart lectures and a lovely man. Note the computers - I spent a day at IBM to see how they worked!  He also directed 2 of the Weds Plays by Nemone Lethbridge. One was called The Portsmouth Defence." Photo from the BBC Archive
data.text: Diana says: "That photo was from a play called The Patch Card directed by James MacTaggart - he of the now annual MacTaggart lectures and a lovely man. Note the computers - I spent a day at IBM to see how they worked! He also directed 2 of the Weds Plays by Nemone Lethbridge. One was called The Portsmouth Defence." Photo from the BBC Archive
